channel.title: Admins don't lose things on death, how to make owner like that, where i edit
channel.description: Well for admins or 2 rights don't lose things on death, I was wondering where can I edit this or so I can also add 3 and 4 rights don't lose things on death as well this is for 508 source + but if you know how to do it on 317s or something just post it, because I can figure it out maybe.... so if you know how for any source please post! I looked and couldn't figure out where, so Please and Thank You!!!!
